useAwait.description:
Description

Ensureasyncfunctions utilizeawait.
This rule reportsasyncfunctions that lack anawaitexpression. Asasyncfunctions return a promise, the use ofawaitis often necessary to capture the
resolved value and handle the asynchronous operation appropriately. Withoutawait,
the function operates synchronously and might not leverage the advantages of async
functions.
useAwait.option: This rule has no specific options.
